configure.title: Configure Cat Care Tracker
configure.description: Enter your Google Spreadsheet ID (found in the URL: {spreadsheet_url}) and your cat's name.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Google Sheets
error.invalid_spreadsheet: Invalid spreadsheet ID or no access. Make sure you have access to the spreadsheet.

abort.missing_configuration: Application credentials not configured. Please configure them first.

application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) to configure your Google Cloud project:
1. Go to [Google Cloud Console]({oauth_creds_url})
2. Create OAuth 2.0 credentials
3. Set authorized redirect URI to: `https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/oauth`
4. Enable the Google Sheets API
